FuncDef:
The description command configures the description for an IOAM policy.
The undo description command deletes the description of an IOAM policy. The description command configures the description for an IOAM policy. The undo description command deletes the description of an IOAM policy. By default, no description is configured for an IOAM policy. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
IOAM policy description information.
The value is a string of 1 to 80 characters, spaces supported.
